original_text: There is nothing outside a person that by going into him can defile him, but the things that come out of a person are what defile him.”
korean_text: 무엇이든지 밖에서 사람에게로 들어가는 것은 능히 사람을 더럽게 하지 못하되

sentences.original_text: There is nothing outside a person
that by going into him can defile him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 들어가 그를 더럽힐 수 있는 것은

sentences.original_text: but the things that come out of a person
